name: Verification Capability
definition: Indicates whether the systemâ€™s critical properties can be formally or practically verified.

values.name: Provable
values.definition: Critical safety or correctness invariants can be verified.

values.name: Key Invariants Verifiable
values.definition: Some critical properties can be verified, but not all.

values.name: Unverifiable
values.definition: Cannot prove correctness or invariants in practice.
